Sentencas: The precursor of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 (LSGM1020) was prepared by phase transfer separation (PTS) process in NH4OH-(NH4)(2)CO3 solution, and the solid electrolyte with low content of impurity phase was obtained at low sintering temperature.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 oxygen-ion conductor

Sentencas: XRD, Raman spectroscopy, DC four-probe, impedance spectroscopy (IS) and SEM were applied to analyze the crystal structure, ionic conductivity and microstructure, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 oxygen-ion conductor

Sentencas: The XRD and Raman analysis show that LSGM1020 possesses rhombohedral structure, and its conductivity reached 0.12 S.cm(-1) at 800degreesC. A fine microstructure in the product was detected by SEM and IS study.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 oxygen-ion conductor

Sentencas: It can be concluded that the utilization of PTS process can lower the sintering temperature of the precursor and improve the microstructure of the final solid electrolyte.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 oxygen-ion conductor
